title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Language Domain Mathematics Education Through Abstract Concepts and Concrete Examples

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can apply strategies linking abstract mathematical concepts to concrete examples with 80% accuracy for language domain problem-solving
Learners utilize optimization principles (e.g., emphasizing core variables, removing unnecessary contexts) at least 3 times when designing concrete examples in PBL team projects

Learners analyze three service/customer interaction scenarios (one abstract, two concrete approaches), compare pros/cons of each approach, and write evaluation reports presenting three or more context-appropriate selection rationales.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
